EEA Tags

EEA Tags¶

Introduction¶

EEA Tags is a Google+/Facebook like replacement for the Plone keywords widget.

Contents

  • EEA Tags
    • Introduction
    • Install
    • Upgrade
    • Copyright and license
      • Contributor(s)
      • Credits
    • Links
    • Funding

Install¶

  • Add eea.tags to your eggs section in your buildout and re-run buildout.
  • Install eea.tags within Site Setup > Add-ons

Upgrade¶

  • Within “Plone > Site setup > Add-ons” click on upgrade button available for eea.tags (if any)
